resources.string: This is the home screen. There is a now playing bar, which is clickable, as well as buttons to the other activities.
This is the library screen. It would list all stored songs and show currently playing song. The now playing bar is also clickable.
This is the now playing screen. You have media player controls and the now playing bar is clickable. Clicking the now playing bar takes you back to the prior activity.
This is the payment screen. It\'s the android pay api. It can be used to make payments within the app.
